entityPackage

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • entityPackage.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains logic and information for board tiles.
    Author:
    Dean Kiourtsis, Tom Finelli

    • Field Detail

      • BUCKET_TILE

        public static final int BUCKET_TILE
        A bucket tile. Used for release levels.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLOCKED_TILE

        public static final int BLOCKED_TILE
        A blocked tile. Indicates that the tile has no value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RANDOM_TILE

        public static final int RANDOM_TILE
        A random tile. Indicates that the tile is random.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(int x,
            int y)
        Constructor for a Tile. NOTE: This constructor should probably be combined with the following constructor.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the tile
        y - the y coordinate of the tile

      • Tile

        public Tile(int col,
            int row,
            int mark,
            int value,
            int multiplier,
            boolean isBlocked)
        Constructs a tile with the given values
        Parameters:
        col - the x coordinate or column number of a tile.
        row - the y coordinate or row number of a tile.
        mark - indicates whether the tile is marked.
        value - the numerical value for the tile.
        multiplier - the multiplier number for the tile.
        isBlocked - indicates whether the tile is a blocked tile.
